description: This creamy mousse with lychees, pistachios and pomegranate makes an impressive dessert.
name: Lychee Yoghurt Mousse Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the gelatine in a heatproof bowl with 3 tablespoons of water. Set aside for 5 minutes to absorb. Place the bowl over a pan of simmering water and heat for 5 minutes, until the gelatin is a clear liquid. Stir in the honey.
Place the lychees in a food processor and add 4 tablespoons of syrup. Blitz to a puree.
Whisk the cream to soft peaks in a large bowl and gently fold in the yoghurt, lychee puree and gelatin and honey mix. Divide between 6 glasses and chill for 4 hours in the fridge.
Top with pomegranate seeds and pistachios and serve.
